welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Roselle Park, known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest and most modern terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, mainly serving United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply select the network and enter your email address to connect.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic flights

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal for international flights

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Terminal for regional flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: International flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 2

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 5

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: International and domestic flights for various airlines

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Domestic flights for American Airlines

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport
